title: Root Slayer Trio Shovel Set
description: Complete set of the meanest, most effective digging tools you can buy. With our 3 most popular Root Slayer products you'll be king or queen of your yard and garden. Roots will split and sever in your path. These Award-Winning tools are used by homeowners and serious professionals alike. You have to use them to understand how much effort you've wasted using conventional tools to cut through roots and sod.
